text:
我反应过来的时候，尿液一股一股的喷射了出来，我不知道里面是否夹杂着精/液，但是我已经被干的失去了半条命，几乎失去了意识。
于是，我，苏栋，一个20岁的大小伙子，被男人干的尿在了床上……
我洗完澡出去的时候，床单已经被林天换好了，也许，还不止床单。
情/欲过后，所有的情绪重新回归，如乱麻一般交织在一起。
“你什么时候放我出去？”
林天没有说话，我看着他：“你不可能关我一辈子。”
trans:
When I regained consciousness, urine was gushing out. I didn't know if it was mixed with semen, but I was already half dead and almost unconscious.
So, I, Su Dong, a 20-year-old boy, was fucked by a man and peed on the bed...
When I came out of the shower, Lin Tian had changed the sheets, ​​and maybe more than just the sheets.
After the passion, all the emotions returned, intertwined like a tangled mess.
"When will you let me out?"
Lin Tian didn't say anything, so I looked at him and said, "You can't lock me up forever."
